com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry

Class RetryingClientBuilder<T extends RetryingClientBuilder<T,U,I,O>,U extends RetryingClient<I,O>,I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry.RetryingClientBuilder<T,U,I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of RetryingClientBuilder
    U - the type of the Client that this builder builds or decorates
    I - the type of outgoing Request of the Client
    O - the type of incoming Response of the Client
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RetryingHttpClientBuilder, RetryingRpcClientBuilder

    public abstract class RetryingClientBuilder<T extends RetryingClientBuilder<T,U,I,O>,U extends RetryingClient<I,O>,I extends Request,O extends Response>
extends Object
    Builds a new RetryingClient or its decorator function.

      Creates a new builder with the specified retry strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • maxTotalAttempts

        public T maxTotalAttempts(int maxTotalAttempts)
        Sets the maximum number of total attempts. If unspecified, the value from Flags.defaultMaxTotalAttempts() will be used.
        Returns:
        T to support method chaining.

      • responseTimeoutMillisForEachAttempt

        public T responseTimeoutMillisForEachAttempt(long responseTimeoutMillisForEachAttempt)
        Sets the response timeout for each attempt in milliseconds. When requests in RetryingClient are made, corresponding responses are timed out by this value. 0 disables the timeout. It will be set by the default value in Flags.defaultResponseTimeoutMillis(), if the client dose not specify.
        Returns:
        T to support method chaining.

      • responseTimeoutForEachAttempt

        public T responseTimeoutForEachAttempt(Duration responseTimeoutForEachAttempt)
        Sets the response timeout for each attempt. When requests in RetryingClient are made, corresponding responses are timed out by this value. 0 disables the timeout.
        Returns:
        T to support method chaining.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
